pullRequest.title: Extend GetOperations api with mtaId query param
pullRequest.bodyText:
Extend the GetOperations api to have a new query param for the mta id.
This will allow more native querying for operation by mta id.
JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1723 and LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1578

nodes.bodyText: Is MTA_ID in this case path variable?
Why this "last" and "state" are not presented as contants but the MTA_ID is ?
Could you put it as last param? For me, it is more intuitevly to add new method parameters in the last positions?
